top.title: US and Iran talks to begin as fears of direct conflict continue
top.summary: The US has built up its military presence in the Middle East in response to Iran's violent crackdown on protests.

top.title: We had sex in a Chinese hotel, then found we had been broadcast to thousands
top.summary: A couple who stayed in Shenzhen discovered their intimate moments were filmed as spy-cam porn.

top.title: Russia and Ukraine exchange prisoners as peace talks end without breakthrough
top.summary: The swap - the first since October - sees 157 Ukrainians and 160 Russians returned home.

top.title: ChatGPT boss ridiculed for online 'tantrum' over rival's Super Bowl ad
top.summary: Commenters said Altman's lengthy post shows "a nerve was well and truly hit" by Anthropic's advert.

top.title: UK's £8bn research fund faces 'hard decisions' as it pauses new grants
top.summary: UKRI boss Ian Chapman said it had been told by the government to "focus and do fewer things better".

top.title: US launches plan to tackle China's critical minerals dominance
top.summary: The event was attended by representatives of more than 50 countries, the White House said.
